allBees.name: Mr. Pollen
allBees.desc: Mr. Pollen's family hails from the European continent, and his laid back perosnality makes him fun to unwind with.

reviews.text: Mr. Pollen has made a wonderful little friend! He's smiley and likes watching the same movies as me

allBees.name: Strawberry Beauty
allBees.desc: This Southern belle is as smart as she is beautiful. She'll keep you guessing with her inquisitive nature and expansive trivia knowledge.

reviews.text: Strawberry Beauty is a great friend to have around. She can be kind of a know-it-all, but I can't hold that against her.

allBees.name: Sean
allBees.desc: This Egnlish gentleman is a fine gem for anyone who enjoys afternoon tea and discussing Medeival politics.

reviews.text: Sean's kind of a jerk, tbh

allBees.name: Dusty Legs
allBees.desc: Ol' Dusty Legs does best as the only bee in the friend group. He can get a little nervous and likes people who will take time to listen to his life's stories

reviews.text: DL is a really nice guy if you give him a chance. He can get a little cranky from time to time, so just make sure he gets plenty of sleep.
